project.title: BNTouch Project
project.short_description: Wordpress website with several landing pages, request forms and blog
about: Project developed as a contructor with the BNTouch company. It is a Wordpress website
with its own built theme which helps BNTouch promoting its main product BNTouch CRM, has blog and

different request forms.

At this project I worked as a Full-Stack Developer. I was responsible for
building markup form scratch, applying it to Wordpress and adding different JavaScript functionality such as
jQuery plugins and custom logic behind the forms and the blog.
After it was build I have been continuing to maintain website by creating different landing pages and editing current ones.
